parameters: Yes, it's related to a classmate in our class
是的哦，这事跟我们班的一位同学有关
是的，我们班的莱因哈特同学
She really fits in with SOS
她确实很符合超自然研究部的气质
Eiii? Is she also a member?
Although I have invited her many times
But she always refused because the sorcerer could not associate with human beings
但是她总是以魔法师一族不能与人类为伍拒绝了
You can go to the rehearsal if you're not interested
你要是不感兴趣的话也可以去看排练
Or you can find your wangmilk~
或者去找你那位王~缪~可~同~学~
Well, I won't joke with you. In fact, we received an anonymous letter in our mailbox
好了不跟你开玩笑了，其实就是我们信箱收到了一封匿名信
The contents of the letter are related to the unidentified life forms we have investigated
信的内容跟我们曾经调查过的不明生命体有关
I still learned through some special methods that she wrote the letter~
我还是通过了一些特殊的方法知道了是她投的信~
So I'm going to find out~
But it should be boring. You can go to see the stage rehearsal first
不过应该会比较无聊，你可以先去看看舞台剧排练
In fact, I'm still a little interested
其实我还是有点兴趣的…
Forget it. Let's see the rehearsal
Reinhardt clearly just said what she saw
莱因哈特同学明明只是很简单的说了下见到的东西
What am I going to do now
All of a sudden there's nothing to do
Shio, did you come to watch the rehearsal
Originally, I accompanied Freelyn to do the investigation
本来是陪菲林同学来做调查的
But she suddenly said she had something to do and left
不过她突然说有事就走了
I guess she went out of school again to do some research
那应该是又跑到学校外去做调查了
No one can stop her when there are something interesting
一有感兴趣的事情谁都拦不住
Can't even find her when doing investigation
做起调查来找都找不到她
诶？西卡班长跟菲林同学认识吗？
Yeah, we've known each other for a long time
I don't know why she transferred to our class on a whim
也不知道她怎么就一时心血来潮转到我们班了
What strange things is she investigating this time?
她这次又在调查些什么奇怪东西？
It seems to be called クネクネ(Twisting around)
好像是叫クネクネ(扭来扭去)…
I don't know what it is though...
我也不知道是什么东西呢…
You know that's not normal when you hear the name
听名字就知道肯定不是什么正常东西了
By the way, are you free now?
If you are free, can you help me go back to class and call Ari
有空的话能帮我回班里叫一下雅莉吗
It's not convenient for me to leave now

parameters.en: Go back to Class 901 to find Ari

parameters: en = Go back to Class 901 to find Ari
Didn't it say you had a new supporting role to play?
不是说有个新的配角要你演吗？
But I've been waiting here for a long time
但我在这里等了好久了
It's not even my turn to rehearse!
塔库亚同学，剧本创作卡壳了
Just figuer out the new character
But I can't think of the lines
Eiii? Can it be like this?
Although he wants to help, Takuya struggling for complete the script by herself
虽然想帮忙，但是塔库亚太执着了，一定要自己完成剧本
So now we have to delay
所以现在只好先拖着了
By the way, why did you come here
Did you finish those thing in SOS?
超自然部的事情做完了吗？
就是因为超自然部的事情所以才过来的啦…
Freelyn said she had something to ask Reinhardt
菲林说有事情要问莱因哈特同学
Ah! I also bought you a salmon bento!
啊！我还给你买了三文鱼便当！
It suddenly occurred to me that
Your lunch was eaten by Freelyn
你那份便当，被菲林吃了
It's OK. I'll buy it later
没事啦，我等下再去买就好了
噢噢噢噢噢噢噢噢噢噢！
噢噢噢噢噢噢噢噢噢噢！
(He seems to be thinking about something, but he doesn't notice me at all)
(好像在想事情，完全没注意到我)
(I can't understand what they are saying)
(I can't understand what they are saying)
I was just scared by thunder
就是被打雷吓到了而已
How abot I take you home first
It's OK to go back by yourself
Why did I really go home
But it seems that there is really nothing to do in school
不过呆在学校好像也确实没什么可做的了
But every time it thunders, I get scared
不过每次打雷都会被吓一跳
But I met new friends today
不过今天认识了新朋友
Freelyn sang give me a strange feeling...
菲林同学给我的感觉，好奇怪啊…
虽然给人的感觉好像…很咸鱼
But in fact, everything is being considered and done
但其实什么都在考虑，什么都在做…
Yeah... she seems to have gone out to investigate
对哦…她好像是出去做调查了
The weather is so bad, I don't know how she is
天气那么差也不知道她还好吗…
Don't need to think too much
Get home so early, then I can play Abex on!
既然那么早回到家那就Abex玩个够吧！
They told me not to talk so much, so I'd better shut up
他们让我少说两句，所以我还是闭嘴吧
I want to be lazy too...
